Text: Part of the deflection of Tory mishandling of Covid19 in Eng.will be a concerted attempt to paint Scotland, SNP/ NS in a bad light. This whole Care Home stunt by House Jocks, the corrupt media and Broadcasters is just the beginning. It won't work of course!
I hate to think this, but I think the Covid19 virus was planned, not an accident! I think these riots were planned. Americans need to stand up and fight.
All power to Hackney school pupils! 'Eton isn't going back until September. If it isn't safe for them it isn't safe for us!' #schoolreopeninguk #COVID19

#mondaythoughts ....Am I sending my kids 2 school ...whilst seeing 4 myself that the R number is still high...threat level high...#covid19 deaths still in the hundreds..observing @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @DominicRaab ; @Conservatives LIE like there's no tomorrow?..HELL NO!🕊️

Trump, hiding in a bunker under military guard, urges authorities to violate the Constitution by attacking protesters and imprisoning them indefinitely.What would you call this if it happened in another country?This is not how a healthy democracy is supposed to work.

JUST IN: President Trump unloads on the nation's governors on a call, calls on them to step up enforcement: "You have to dominate, if you don't dominate you're wasting your time. They're going to run over you, you're going to look like a bunch of jerks. You have to dominate."
